content.body:
> I will be asking the SES folks this week for the 2nd Wednesday each month for the EMEA-friendly meeting

this has been accepted (thank you KKL!) which means that:

our next meetings are:

2023-07-25 18:00 Pacific US / 2023-07-26 01:00 UTC / 2023-07-26 09:00 China
and
2023-08-09 10:00 Pacific US / 2023-08-09 17:00 UTC / 2023-08-10 01:00 China
